title: Text to Speech - Speechbot
description: This challenge is a great for you to work advanced built-in JavaScript functionality. The challenge is to create a simple tech to speech application that requires you to work with advanced JavaScript functionalities.

userStories.content: Create a text to speech app that matches the given design.
Use HTML to create basic structure.
Add inputs, tabs, buttons,.. according to the design.
Users should be able to enter custom text.
Users should be able to choose the voice of the speech, the default should be 'Albert'.
Users should be able to choose the speed of the speech (0.5, 0.75, 1 or 1.5 times).
Users should be able to select Text to Speech button and listen to the speech.
The page should be responsive on different screen sizes.
